name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with a strong ability to engage in customer consulting, market analysis, and proposal preparation, utilizing my solid teamwork and customer-focused approach. I possess exceptional communication and negotiation skills, ensuring successful interactions with clients. My background in electrical engineering complements my technical expertise, enabling me to bridge the gap between technology and client needs effectively.
With 8 years of experience in high-performance solution development, I leverage my knowledge of **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to consult on technology solutions that fit customer requirements. Proficient in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I also have extensive experience with **Azure** and **AWS** cloud services, providing clients with robust, scalable solutions. My technical foundation supports my ability to convey complex concepts clearly to diverse audiences, fostering strong relationships that drive sales success.
